title: 014 - March Sadness Round 1 Results
description: On today's episode of The Pod, the guys go over the results front the first round of March Sadness as they dive into all the surprises, upsets, signature victories, and big moments from the first two days of the tournament. The guys also give a preview of an online scavenger hunt for this weekend, where the winner will receive $1,000. Looks for more information on this when the guys do an additional LIVE pod tomorrow at youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow when The Pod joins McAfee & Hawk Sports Talk for a crossover episode. Keep an eye out for @ThePodPMI on Instagram and Twitter as the next round matchups will be released. Be smart, and have a safe weekend. Enjoy.
